name: Scyan Engineering
desc:
TThe Scyan Engineering College optimizes its designs for hunter-killer purposes.

Specialized flux-grids feature immense capacitor reserves and exceptionally strong active venting, limited by poor passive dissipation.

Custom Magneto-Aerospike engines boast exceptional thrust, high durability, fast repair times, and emergency restart functions, though incompatible with further upgrades.

Stealth plating and ambush protocols allow for a lower maintenance and sensor signature when moving slowly, however visibility notably increases from the massive thrust bloom during active maneuvers.
short: Faster ships that vent quickly, few weapons and little dissipation.

name: Modular Armor
desc:
This modular armor is a recent innovation that allows specially fitted ships to drop these extremely massive armored plates when they no longer provide protection.

Modifications to the ship may also affect the modules.
Increases the ship's top speed gradually as modules are lost, maxing out at %s higher when all armor is dropped.
short: Raises the speed of armored ships as they drop their protection plates.

name: Modular Sections
desc:
This massive ship cannot withstand heavy combat damage. Both the built-in gun barrel and the flight deck can be outright destroyed, disabling the main weapon of the ship or preventing fighter replenishment respectively.

Shedding these large sections however increases the ship's top speed, maxing out at %s percent.
short: Raises the speed of modular ships as sections get destroyed.

name: Modular Armor
desc: Child modules inherit the changes to hull and armor from their parent.
short: Child modules inherit the changes to hull and armor from their parent.

name: Scyan Interception Protocols
desc: The ship's crews have received special training on the best ways to intercept an enemy fleet, or avoid interception themselves. The ship gain %s better sensors, and %s smaller signature.
short: Ships gain an improved sensor profile.
